song.title: Doxology
song.lyrics:
[INTRO] .A
[1] . A praise God from whom all blessings flow . E praise Him all creatures here below || . A praise Him above ye Heavenly Host . E A praise Father Son and Holy Ghost
[2] . A praise God for all that He has done . E praise Him for He has overcome || . A the grave is beaten love has won . E A praise God our Savior, Christ the Son
